name: Sheep! Alpha - My overlay pet
description:
Sheep! is a tamagotchi-styled game in which you take care of your pet sheep!

However, this sheep likes you too much so it walks on your screen! You can enter edit mode and drag your sheep, change its environment, feed it, grow it, and play with it! 

You can also upgrade your sheep and get bonuses, and unlock some secret abilities!

After months of hard work, this game is out so we have decided to give this game for free for the first week of the release! That means that you can claim it now and get all updates later on, for FREE!

Have fun!

Since the game is in alpha, it may have some bugs or unexpected events. However, all alpha testers will get special rewards for playing the game!
